attributes.review: This app almost crashed my phone as soon as I opened it and it has a lot of Misinformation. Rate 1 out of 5 stars

attributes.review: For a satirical app, it wasn’t very funny. I think all Americans agree that being a racist, homophobic, rapist isn’t something to be joked about.
attributes.title: Just awful.

attributes.review: This app borderline does not work, gives false information, fake news, misrepresents data, and is filled with lies! Absolutely absurd.
attributes.title: Poorly Composed

attributes.review: The app was horrible! I tried using for a project made in in door learning and it was just yuck. Took forever to load, and it wasn't that good at navigating. It's just a yuck ucky app.
attributes.title: uh uh

attributes.review: This app is a no. I don’t like Cheetos. 🟠 this app is a orange from Gordon Ramsey’s kitchen! 📉 I hate the way the app is promoting politics like can’t we escape it for once in the world!! ‼️ But anyways I do NOT recommend this app 😘
attributes.title: Cheetos!!!

attributes.review: This app gave me nightmares because when I opened the app I saw a terrifying orange monster with no lips and I thought “he has no lips how would he get a kiss kiss” but all jokes aside I saw the worst person in America, Tr-🤢Tru-🤢Trump🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮
attributes.title: WORST APP EVERRR

attributes.review: Had to delete right away that how bad this app what if I could give it -0 I would absolutely disgusting app shaking my head

attributes.review: this app is just very cult like, and disgusting. I just don’t wanna see a cheeto when I open an app you know what I mean 😔🧚‍♀️

attributes.review: I opened this app to an orange in a suit. It was very disturbing and horrific. worst app on the market and definitely would give a 0 out of 10.
